jobs.description: LTI is the largest mid-cap IT company in India with a revenue exceeding $1 billion for 2017-18. It has a market capitalisation of Rs 29,900 crore INR, and is now the seventh largest on the market cap league table of all listed IT companies in India.

Accenture plc, is an Irish-domiciled multinational professional services company. A Fortune Global 500 company, it has been incorporated in Dublin. In 2019, the company reported revenues of $43.2 billion, with more than 492,000 employees serving clients in more than 120 countries.

Tata Consultancy Services Limited is a multinational IT company. Having offices across 46 countries.  TCS has 400k+ employees worldwide earning 20 billion $+ as annual revenue, here I work as a software engineer where I develop web applications for various clients.
